Wishing You a Happy New Year
Take a look at readers' favorite articles from 2017, along with an important update on NAT Airspace... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/HappyHolidaysDec17]]>
North Atlantic Region Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/NATOTSDec17]]> RLatSM Trials
Reduced Lateral Separation Minimum is the ongoing trial of 25NM lateral separation on the North Atlantic Organized Track System... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/NATOTSDec17]]> Flight Technical Services Q&A <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/VNAVTODec17]]> Using VNAV on Takeoff
Q: Can I arm VNAV prior to Takeoff? A: This is one of the more common questions Flight Technical Services has been asked.. Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/VNAVTODec17]]>
Mandates Corner <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/HAADec17]]> Helicopter Air Ambulance Mandates in the U.S.
This year, the FAA’s newly rolled-out Helicopter Air Ambulance (HAA) Mandates started to go into effect... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Dec2017/HAADec17]]>
